title: 89/6/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 December 1988 amending for the third time Decision 76/653/EEC authorizing the Kingdom of Denmark and the French Republic to certify seed of certain species of cereals, under special conditions (only the Danish and the French versions of this text are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 December 1988
amending for the third time Decision 76/653/EEC authorizing the Kingdom of Denmark and the French Republic to certify seed of certain species of cereals, under special conditions
(Only the Danish and the French versions of this text are authentic)
(89/6/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Decision 76/653/EEC, '31 December 1982' is replaced by '30 June 1989'.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark and the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
